ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who have certainly provoked our wrath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There is a small group of people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed they have angered all of us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, they have done what has enraged us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely they have enraged us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and indeed they are enraging us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! they are offenders against us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily they have enraged US.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they are raging furiously against us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, they have done what has enraged us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, they are enraging us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:55] And indeed they have enraged us, their actions infuriate us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! they are offenders against us) they have caused our fury and anger.
